Method Detail

getFirstChildElement

public static org.w3c.dom.Element getFirstChildElement(org.w3c.dom.Element parent)
Returns the first child that is of type element. This and function below give the ability to iterate through the children of type element

Parameters:
parent - The parent whose children we will search and return
Returns:
Returns the first child of 'parent' that is an element.

getNextSiblingElement

public static org.w3c.dom.Element getNextSiblingElement(org.w3c.dom.Element me)
Returns the next sibling that is of type element.

Parameters:
me - We find 'me's next sibling of type element.
Returns:
Returns the next sibling element.

getChildElementsByTagName

public static java.util.ArrayList getChildElementsByTagName(org.w3c.dom.Element parent,
                                                            java.lang.String tagName)
Returns all children with the specified tag name. This differs from getElementsByTagName in that it returns only children elements, not all descendent elements

Parameters:
parent - The parent whose children are to be searched
tagName - The tag name to be used to select child elements
Returns:
Returns an ArrayList with the appropriate children elements

getTextValue

public static java.lang.String getTextValue(org.w3c.dom.Node node)
Returns the content of the first text child of the given node

Parameters:
node - The element to return the child of
Returns:
The first text child of node

setTextValue

public static void setTextValue(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                                java.lang.String value)
Changes the value of the text child (assume there is only one - uugh!!) to the string passed as a param.

Parameters:
node - The element to return the child of
value - The new text value

getFirstChildEltByTagName

public static org.w3c.dom.Element getFirstChildEltByTagName(org.w3c.dom.Element parent,
                                                            java.lang.String tagName)
Retrieves the first child with tag name tagName

Parameters:
parent - The element whose children to search
tagName - The tag name to search for
Returns:
The child with the specified tag name.
